questions.question: The Convective heat transfer coefficient in case of fluid flowing in the tubes is not affected by the tube length/diameter ratio, if the flow is in the __________ zone.
Bulk of the convective heat transfer resistance from a hot tube surface to the fluidflowing in it, is

answers.a: in the central core of the fluid.
answers.c: mainly confined to a to a thin film of fluid near the surface.

questions.question: Mark the system where heat transfer is given by forced convection.

answers.a: Chilling effect of cold wind on warm body
answers.b: Fluid passing through the tubes of a condenser and other heat exchange equipment
answers.c: Heat flow from a hot pavement to surrounding atmosphere
answers.d: Heat exchange on the outside of cold and warm pipes

questions.question: Forced convection in a liquid bath is caused by?

answers.a: Intense stirring by an external agency
answers.c: Density difference brought about by temperature gradients
answers.d: Flow of electrons in a random fashion

questions.question: Examples of forced convection are using water heaters or geysers for instant heating of water.
